## Distance

# Euclidian

$$
dist = \sqrt{\vec{x}^2 + \vec{y}^2}
$$
# Chi-squared

$$
O_{ij} = \text{augmented matrix from } \vec{x} \text{ and } \vec{y} \\
E_{ij} = \text{matrix of expected count for } O_{ij} \\
dist = \sum{(E_{ij} - O_{ij}) ^ 2 / E_{ij}} \\
$$
